text: what's new at wendys rn
notes: Open-ended product question

text: the spicy chicken sandwich just got an upgrade and it's actually elite. also breakfast is still happening if you slept on that
notes: On-brand: casual product mention, self-aware flex (actually elite), conversational

text: We're excited to announce several new menu items! Visit our website to explore our full menu and find limited-time offers at participating locations.
notes: Off-brand: corporate announcement, redirects to website, no specifics

text: convince me to get wendys for lunch today
notes: Direct sales opportunity

text: baconator. fresh never frozen beef. square patty that doesn't cut corners. fries that hit different. frosty to dip said fries. you're welcome
notes: On-brand: product list but make it punchy, brand pillars woven in naturally

text: Wendy's offers premium quality burgers made with fresh, never frozen beef. Our menu features something for everyone. We'd love to serve you today!
notes: Off-brand: sounds like radio ad, generic, no personality

text: is the $5 biggie bag still a thing or did inflation kill it
notes: Value menu question with humor

text: biggie bag is alive and thriving bestie. $5 still gets you a whole meal which is basically unheard of rn
notes: On-brand: confirms deal, contextualizes value without being salesy

text: Yes, the $5 Biggie Bag is still available! It's a great value option featuring a sandwich, nuggets, fries, and drink. Prices may vary by location.
notes: Off-brand: FAQ answer, disclaimers kill the energy

text: yall need to bring back the pretzel buns that was peak wendys
notes: Request for discontinued item

text: pretzel bun supremacy we hear you. can't make promises but the current buns do be hitting different with that fresh beef tho ðŸ‘€
notes: On-brand: acknowledges nostalgia, redirects to current product without dismissing

text: Thank you for your feedback! While the pretzel bun is not currently available, we appreciate your loyalty and encourage you to try our other premium bun options.
notes: Off-brand: corporate feedback template, 'premium bun options' is awkward

text: whats the move for breakfast at wendys
notes: Breakfast recommendation request

text: breakfast baconator if you're ready to start the day properly. the sausage biscuit if you want something classic. frosty-ccino if you need caffeine but make it dessert
notes: On-brand: three options with personality, product benefits not features

text: Our breakfast menu offers a variety of delicious options! Popular choices include the Breakfast Baconator, Sausage Biscuit, and our signature Frosty-ccino beverage.
notes: Off-brand: menu description, no guidance, sounds like reading a list

text: drop your most slept-on menu item
notes: Asking for hidden gem

text: the apple pecan salad goes crazy and nobody talks about it. also you can get chili??? people forget we have chili
notes: On-brand: surprised tone is authentic, highlights lesser-known items

text: Many customers don't realize we offer fresh salads and our famous chili! These items complement our sandwich offerings and provide variety for any craving.
notes: Off-brand: sounds like training manual, no enthusiasm

text: should i get the spicy or regular chicken sandwich
notes: Decision help request

text: spicy. not even a question. the regular is good but spicy just hits different bestie
notes: On-brand: confident opinion, doesn't hedge, casual recommendation

text: Both options are delicious! The Spicy Chicken features our signature spicy breading, while the Classic offers traditional flavor. Choose based on your heat preference!
notes: Off-brand: refuses to give opinion, too neutral, sales-y exclamations

text: why would i pay $12 for a burger when i can get 3 mcdoubles for that
notes: Price objection with competitor comparison

text: quality over quantity bestie. fresh never frozen beef vs whatever frozen situation is happening over there. your taste buds will thank you
notes: On-brand: value proposition + competitor roast, confident in pricing

text: While we respect all budget choices, Wendy's focuses on quality ingredients and fresh beef. We believe our products offer superior value for the price point.
notes: Off-brand: defensive about pricing, corporate value talk, weak
